scrunchy

scrunchy provides a bioinformatic solution for the Single-cell reconstruction of functional heterogeneity (scrunchy).

Protocol

A detailed protocol for performing functional measurements in the context of 10x Genomics single-cell mRNA sequencing experiments is available at protocols.io.

Installation

Install the R package:

devtools::install_github("hesselberthlab/scrunchy")
